LanguageData.FTC_SandBag1x2c.label: Stacked sandbags (1x2)
LanguageData.FTC_SandBag1x2c.description: A stack of sandbags. Can provide durable cover or be used as decoration.

LanguageData.FTC_PowerConduit.label: Facility conduit
LanguageData.FTC_PowerConduit.description: A bundle of electrical cabling inside a durable casing for moving power around inside fortifications. It's hidden beneath the floors, so it also looks fine to people.
